text: Michael Callan (born November 22, 1935-11 October 2022) is an American actor. He was best known for the role of Riff in West Side Story on Broadway, and for his movie roles for Columbia Pictures, notably Gidget Goes Hawaiian, The Interns and Cat Ballou.Michael Callan profile, filmreference.com; accessed April 4, 2015. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Philadelphia
title: Michael Callan
